Dialogues.Speaker: Ganyo
Dialogues.Text: Ouch... My head hurts sooo bad. What happened with me? What is this place?

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.Text: *Ganyos stomach purrs*

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganyo
Dialogues.Text: I wonder if there's something to eat around here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.Text: *Ganyo sees a house up in the distance*

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganyo
Dialogues.Text: What is that? Hopefully no one lives there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.Text: *Ganyo finds food*

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganyo
Dialogues.Text: Oooh, finally some food. This can will do me good for a few nights.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.Text: *Ganyo munches*

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.Text: *Ganyo is full*

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.Text: *The owner of the house walks in*

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumberjack
Dialogues.Text: Hey you, what are you doing in my house?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganyo
Dialogues.Text: WOAH? Who are you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Sevar
Dialogues.Text: I am Sevar and I own this house.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganyo
Dialogues.Text: I'm really sorry. Where am I?

Dialogues.Speaker: Sevar
Dialogues.Text: You're in the Magic Forest of Dalemia.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganyo
Dialogues.Text: Da- what?

Dialogues.Speaker: Sevar
Dialogues.Text: Dalemia, the biggest of the Seven Kingdoms.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganyo thinks to himself
Dialogues.Text: How did I end up here? I've not even heard about this place. Let's ask him how to get out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganyo
Dialogues.Text: I'm really sorry for entering your house. Can you please show me the exit?

Dialogues.Speaker: Sevar
Dialogues.Text: You ain't going anywhere. Hahahahahaha!
